name: AXServerAOSAction
description: Does start, stop or restart an AOS service of AX
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action, either Start, Stop or Restart the aos service.

inputs.name: destination
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the service action run on local or remote maschine?

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: computerNames
inputs.label: Computer name(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The computer name(s) to run the service action (comma-separated)

inputs.name: serviceNames
inputs.label: Service name(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service name(s) to perform the service action (comma-separated)

inputs.name: retryIfAssembliesNotWritten
inputs.label: Retry (if assemblies not written)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retries the action if the assemblies not written to IL folder. (Caution: All assemblies need to be deleted before the service action runs)

inputs.name: folderShareNames
inputs.label: Folder share(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder share(s) to check IL assemblies has written (comma-separated, mandatory if Retry has checked)

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX Server - AOS service action: $(configurationFileName) - $(action)
